name: DEKKEN Space
description:
This game is the result of the Chip'n'Jam 2020.

A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away... there were two robots. They didn't like each other. And because lightsabers are physically not possible, but changing your own gravity is, they fight on the *deck* of a spaceship owned by neither of them.

Grab a friend, challenge him and Newton's physics and have fun!

Created by Gamewerkstatt JUKUZ Aschaffenburg - to be more precise:
Programming: Robin *, Eduard Ott (EDged_Programming), Christian Streinz (Coded[]Art)
Graphics: Steffen Bonefeld, Alexander Voß, Eduard Ott, Robin *
Music: Miguel *, Rediezminor88
